notesStmt.note: Dark stains at edges from damp entry. Old repairs at edges.
Aba ben Yitsḥaḳ, folios 3r and 4r; Yitsḥaḳ, folio 74r. Several entries of birth, lower part of folio 63v (dated 1819, 1821, 1822, and 1840), in Hebrew and Persian.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
